website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting professional-grade insecticide that works well against wasps.
pros: Great for indoor and outdoor use and keeps wasps away for several weeks after spraying
Concentrated formula needs to be diluted and lasts a long time
cons: Some buyers received bottles that were leaking

customer_reviews.title: I live in a log home and wood boring bees became a real problem
customer_reviews.text: I live in a log home and wood boring bees became a real problem. I used this with a 2 gallon pump sprayer from Lowe's. 48 mil w/ 2 gallon. The first time using it was unsuccessful, because I didn't get the entire home sprayed. I couldn't reach the 2nd story w/o a ladder. The next time I was able to coat the 1st and 2nd stories and by the next morning all but a couple bees were gone!!! Went from 50+ to 2-3 in a few hours!! Within a couple days had beetles, roaches, and hardshell bugs laying dead on my porches.
customer_reviews.author: motox851

customer_reviews.title: This product works great and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I used to do pest control and this is what we used for our quarterly treatments for our customers. This product works great and lasts a long time. I recommend it to anyone who asks me what to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tarkoba

customer_reviews.title: Kill those bugs DEAD!
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this product several times since we moved into our new home. House had been overgrown with shrubbery and bugs! Hubby has used it to spray carpenter bees (in holes they drilled into the house), the yard (fleas & ticks), and general bug spraying indoors. No strong odor, and it WORKS! A little expensive compared to the stuff you buy at your local store, but a lot cheaper than hiring a professional, who will probably use this! Built-in measuring cup makes it too easy to mix up, so there is no excuse not to do it yourself!
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for years. It definitely works and is by far the best stuff I have used. I use it outside and inside. I spray late in the evening, when it's cool and not in direct sunlight to let it soak in. Dead bugs were all over the next day. Sad to say looks like a lizard fed on all of the dead bugs and it died as well. This stuff WORKS! If anyone else has a better product please tell us. I'm always on the look out. But for now this is my goto product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike929

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for someone else
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone who believed they had bedbugs. Their exterminator could not get to their house for like two weeks or so. I purchased this for them because they were so upset, and I had been at their house, so I wanted to make sure I was protected too in case the need arose. The exterminator didn't find a single live bug, but there were dead ones. He asked about what they had used, and when he looked over the bottle he said it was a professional grade product. He asked if they had followed the instructions to make sure they used it safely, but overall he seemed impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: DEMAND CS
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what happened here or if this product is outdated... But I've used DEMAND CS before as I worked at an pest company... This did not work as I've seen in the past. Right now I'm not impressed with any of this. UPDATE: The roaches I was trying to get earlier were German Roaches... The small ones. I know those are VERY difficult to get rid of. Although in the past Demand handled them, they may have adapt. I've since used the Demand in my yard for spiders and ants and it worked great. I only wish it still could have taken care of the small roaches
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for killing cockroaches
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the suggestion of a friend who worked in pest control for several years professionally. This completely eliminated our roach problem within a week. After spraying, we’d find 3-5 dead roaches every morning and haven’t seen a live roach anywhere for weeks. We treated the inside and outside of our house. It’s killed almost all other insects around the house as well.
customer_reviews.author: JB89

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for mw
customer_reviews.text: I follow proper dosing I applied once........bugs walking around like nothing happened I applied twice.......bugs still chilling in my house like they're on on vacation Maybe I just got a bad batch because the date on the bottle said December 2018.............?????? I dunno.....it just simply didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Bucs Anthem

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with hopes of killing some black widows and other bugs around the exterior of my home. I used 6ml of solution, and one gallon of water less than a week ago. We have already found 3 deal black widows outside of our home, and other bugs dead. In less than a week! I will be spraying again in about 30 days to do one more coat, but then it should be good for several months. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Needed to kill some ants, and ants it did kill.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to kill some ants, and ants it did kill. This year was horrible with tiny little brown/black ants. Every home owner I talked to in the NW Chicago complained about the same, this was recommended by a couple that had professionals come out and used this. Very happy. With all poison, no matter what the label claims, be careful around children and pets. I personally avoid using anything more than boric acid indoors.
customer_reviews.author: RomanS

customer_reviews.title: Demand aka ICON (Europe). Over 20 years of use.
customer_reviews.text: Get this and spray once every 4 months in and outside the house. Stop paying $$$ a year to those pest control firms. This is exactly what they use and it’s harmless to humans, pets, plants and ok for food storage areas. No bugs, kills everything. Mop the floor and spray 20cm from wall all around. Air dry and you’re ok for 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Gianni Choco

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Had a roach infestation so bad that if you leaned on the counter for a minute, you would have 10 roaches crawling on your shirt! It was bad. I was scared for my family to sleep there. I bought this stuff and sprayed it with a old 409 spray bottle, next day the roaches were more active than usual, then 4 days later I just see one sporadically here & there. Ive tried them all at one time or another but this stuff works!! This capsule technology is awesome...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, no bed bugs, no spiders, no bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: Works Well, no bed bugs, no spiders, no bad smell. It's a slow killer, but it kills for weeks. WikiPedia says Lambda-Cyhalothrin ( the active ingredient ) works best.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Relf

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my issue
customer_reviews.text: I had an outdoor flea problem brought in by a possum. This did not get rid of it. I applied several applications and ended up getting something else that worked instead (1 Demon WP 4 pack). This product may be OK for some things but did not work for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: hike2camp

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for in-ground yellow jacket nests
customer_reviews.text: After reading the info on this product I thought I would try it for yellow jacket nest they had built in ground. I was stung before I knew the nest existed so I wanted them gone. First I used an entire can of HotShot. Nothing. Then I tried the Demand Cs. First at rated dilution. Nothing. Let’s step it up to 12ml per gallon. Nothing, still there. Let’s try one more application at an even higher rate. Still there. Now I am on to Delta dust. I don’t see a yellow jacket in sight. Learn from my mistake. Demand CS might be good for perimeter protection but not for yellow jacket nests
customer_reviews.author: R. Clink

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good used this product at my parents house for bed bugs had spent thousands of dollars trying to get rid of an infestation. This so far has worked and will be using it to maintain my parents house pest free. I also used some around my house for black widows and spiders so far no spiders! Awesome product and will be reordering again.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works great and lasts
customer_reviews.text: My pest control tech was getting out of the the business, to do property management, and told me about this spray mix. I no longer pay hundreds for someone to spray my house and pole barn, as I can do it myself. I wear a respirator and my back pack sprayer. I no longer have to worry about bugs or wasps/hornets. This concentrate has worked so well, that I've never tried another mix or brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do what we want
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in for a while, but hadn't purchased off Amazon before now. My brother says this is the same stuff their pest control company uses. Spray it around the baseboards inside our home and then after a few weeks I spray around the outside of our home. I repeat this process every 5 months. From what we can tell, it works as we haven't had any major issues in the past. It mixes well and it's good piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Dover

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product had bed bug problems sprayed over ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product had bed bug problems sprayed over once a week for 3 weeks don't see any bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: After numerous fails with ineffective home center products, I did some research and came across this product. I’m absolutely thrilled with the results. Finally solved my problem with these 1-inch long worm-like millipede Bugs. Complete success, and after just one application. The product is very cost effective given the dilution rate. I did 9mL/gallon of water, and pump sprayed the perimeter of the house and garage. In two days, zero bugs. Nothing else I’ve tried worked this well. No bad odors, no stains, no harm to grass or flowers. Absolutely amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: G. MCBROOM

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the results from this product. We bought a 5 gallon sprayer and were able to cover everything we needed to in 1 round. Spraying our wooden fence really helped with carpenter bees. We have done several treatments now and it seems like every time my husband sprays, the next day there are all sorts of dead bugs outside our house...even stink bugs which are bad where I live. It's awesome!! Kind of like a bug bomb went off. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Pest control
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered your product in the past and its the best pest control liquid ever. However, I reordered another bottle on October 2, 2019 and the product is turning pink on the top and at the bottom of the tube. I was looking at the bottle tonight and discovered it was out of date when I received it. In the attached pictures you can see what I'm referring to. I'm requesting a replacement bottle with a current date. If needed, I can return the bottle I received back on October 2, 2019. Please advise. Thank you for your assistance in this matter. Mrs. R. Buck
customer_reviews.author: nancy Buck

customer_reviews.title: Worked 95%
customer_reviews.text: I was plagued with spiders, webs and droppings around the house and finally decided to research something to use. I took a chance on this and sprayed around the exterior only about 2 months ago. Almost no spiders or other bugs since then - except for ants, but that's a pest of a different type. (I got some ant traps and distributed them around entry points and they are gone now too.) I plan to spray again as soon as I see them coming back, but not sure how long that will be. I still see dead rolly polly bugs on the screened in porch, but at least they're outside.
customer_reviews.author: austincfoster

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used this product yet but will in 1 month. I purchased this along with Demon WP and Martin’s IGR. The plan is to rotate every 2 months mixing Demon Wp with The IGR then Demand CS with IGR as part is a plan for a roach problem we aquired for the first time about 3 months ago. This was recommended by a local pest business and the WP mix has done great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Annihilation!
customer_reviews.text: A buddy in pest control told me about this chem. I live in southern utah, and roaches are common, as well as scorpions. I spray this around the perimeter of the house and the corners of the garage every couple of months. Kills any insect we encounter. It takes several hours after contact to work, but leaves an excellent residual barrier that lasts. One bottle typically lasts me 1 to 2 years, depending on how frequently I apply. Just finished my first bottle, and just ordered a second!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: This stuff Works
customer_reviews.text: I had a hornet issue! key word "HAD". the mixing instructions are a bit confusing. read and read again. it does not take much to make a gallon of mixed product. I purchased a large syringe at a farm & supply store for ease of measuring. the first time I handled the product got some on my hands. within 30 minutes I was feeling a bit funny. could not taste, sight was a bit blurry. be careful. it did go away in a couple of hours. worked better than any other product I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Push

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend for spiders
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I decided to purchase. I have had a large spider problem outside my home for years. I had finally had enough of seeing webs and spiders on every window screen, porch , skirting of my house , connecting to everything plants, garbage cans, outdoor furniture. I didn't use indoors since I only see a few spiders from time to time. It's only been two days since I sprayed after cleaning off every cobweb I could find and no new ones have appeared. I highly recommend this product. I can now enjoy my yard.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: List of pests I used it for. Updated with kill effectiveness.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for ants, house centipedes, spiders, spider crickets, and general "barrier" for other small bugs (I live in a wooded area). Will update each pest with effectiveness: Spider cricket: dead within 5min of contact. It jumped around quite a bit until it died Ants: didn't seem to immediately kill after first contact, 30min later didn't stop their pathing and no dead ants yet. Will wait 48hrs to check and update.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Effective bug spray!
customer_reviews.text: We have problems with spiders, slugs and moths constantly on siding at doors, garage door and outdoor lights. I've sprayed all areas that were a problem and within 48 hours the bugs are gone. This spray didn't stop the wasps but all other bugs are no longer a problem. This was definitely worth the purchase and I would buy again. Effective and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: I hired an exterminator and asked what he used. He told me Demand CS. Looked on Amazon and was surprised they sold it since it was somewhat of a commercial product. Well why pay someone when I can do it myself. The bottle is small but it's worth it. You don't have to put much of it in. I'm estimating it'll probably last me a few years. Sprayed outside my perimeter and it worked - saw dead roaches and other bugs the following weeks. Will probably need to spray around the house every 3-4 months. Satisfied with the product. Works for bugs in the Northern California / Bay Area.
customer_reviews.author: NorCalAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Best Insecticide for Ants, flies, roaches, and other crawling or flying pests.
customer_reviews.text: This synthetic pyrethroid product has a great safety margin and lack of toxicity to birds and mammals, but it is deadly to insects and other arthropods. I recommend it highly for application both inside and outdoor according to label directions
customer_reviews.author: Fozwort

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product just like the professionals use
customer_reviews.text: This product is what I've been looking for. A local exterminator shared with me that this is what he uses. Safe for paint, surfaces, and pets(once dry). It has long-lasting residual effect on insect populations. Performs very well. You can't find over the counter product this effective. If it rains a great deal after outdoor application it may need re-applied.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for years now. Please don't pay a company to spray probably the same stuff on your house. I'm guilty of using to much in one spraying. But it makes me feel better adding a little extra solution to my gallon sprayer. I spray twice a year of so and this stuff really works.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive and doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: It sucks don't buy it . I sprayed my property 3 times. Didnt do anything. Still had ticks , spiders, bugs ect. I used white vinegar and peppermint mix on water 1÷1 and a cup of peppermint oil. And everything disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Desmodoktor

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for pests
customer_reviews.text: According to my bug guy, he stated that this product has a good lasting life once it is sprayed. Apparently, it lasts a good long time, even after it rains, and lasts about 60 days or more.
customer_reviews.author: greeky

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I didn't see a mass die off like you do sometimes with bug sprays but it sure seemed to have built a barrier. It did kill visible insects on contact but I didn't see the dead bugs the next morning, nor did I really see any bugs at all. After about a week I did see the outdoor ants but nothing got to the house.
customer_reviews.author: R. Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work for all bugs.
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend who used it to spray the outside of my house after I told him about a wolf spider problem. Has worked very well. A few stray ants that must have been trapped inside, but I was happy to know that we can also use in the house and you only need such a small amount. I was worried about free roaming chickens outside and dog, no problem at all! Ordered my own which came promptly. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W.

customer_reviews.title: Kills bugs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had historically used Talstar P but it wasn’t available so I went with Demand CS based on reviews describing them as similar. I’ve had the same experience - I can’t tell a difference between this and Talstar, as both are super effective and seem to last about the same length of time. I mainly use this for external control of flies around garbage areas and it’s worked magnificently. I very much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works really well right away.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to get rid of several huge carpenter bees that had begun making their home in a window frame near my basement. Just followed the proper mixing amounts using a 1-gallon sprayer and it worked like a charm. Literally sprayed one time and have not seen a single bee in that area since. It has been two weeks and not a sign of any bees, which were out and about all the time before I sprayed. Could not be happier with the results. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction from this product in the bedbug are worse
customer_reviews.text: I used to half a gallon of it and put the whole product inside sprays the room the couch and did nothing happen bugs get worse I got a irritation allergy reaction from the spray
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as listed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use on a bed bug problem and used per the instructions and at first the bed bugs seem to be gone but I waited the 21 days to treat again and they cam back much sooner. After another treatment the bed bugs came back even sooner and are now just as bad as before. Treating sooner and now showing no difference. Must try something else.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nicks

customer_reviews.title: i even raked the soil to do it again but it was no good.
customer_reviews.text: it had no effect against mites in the soil under the porch which keeps coming in the house at night or when it's about to rain or raining or when the temperature drops. i even raked the soil to do it again but it was no good.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Demand CS is has always been a great product and we will continue to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 4 years and nothing lives. Knocks wasps from the air and destroys brown recluse
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Product Does Not work
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on August 10 & used as directed indoors & out for pest control. This product Does Not work, even after repeated applications. This was a complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: sherry stone

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works! We bought our house new a ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! We bought our house new a little over a year ago and I've been spraying this since. I spray indoors and out and almost never see bugs in the house. When I do occasionally see them, its because I haven't sprayed in a while. It a spider pops up, it's time to spray the house again. It's about a 3000sqft house so it takes an hour or so every 2-3 months, but I feel confident we're not going to have insect issues. I'll never pay pest control companies again when I can do it so cheaply myself!
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: A must for a bug/spider free home
customer_reviews.text: Great product for minimizing spiders, stink bugs, box elders, etc from around our house, deck, swing set, and playhouse. I reapply every 6 weeks using a backpack sprayer at a fraction of the cost for a professional to do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Family DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of seeing spiderwebs and cobwebs around the exterior of my house. I followed the instructions and sprayed around the perimeter and it worked. I followed up with a second application a week later and now, two months later only a few webs here and there are found. I loaned it to a relative and it worked on his house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Idaho

customer_reviews.title: No big change
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks now and haven't really seem much improvement. It almost seems like the insects get drunk and wake up the next day with just a hangover! It does work on some insects like ants but based on the previous reviews I thought it would have been a good investment. I am in a very wooded area with bugs that look like they are out of sci fi movies so it just may not be strong enough for them.
customer_reviews.author: Bayoulady

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bee Infestation.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for bees. Had a huge infestation inside patio ceiling. Sprayed this, they were gone in ONE DAY. Amazing. Got rid of wasps too.
customer_reviews.author: Longhorn10022

customer_reviews.title: Killed scorpions fast.
customer_reviews.text: Well I have to say I already used it tonight and it worked. Killed a scorpion dead. I sprayed the scorpion directly and dead it went. Great death to the bugs after I sprayed it everywhere I could outside. Can’t wait to see what dead bugs come out tomorrow and through the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: EASE OF USE YOU ,CAN MAKE SMALL BATCHES ,YOU CAN USE IT IN YOUR HOUSE IT DRIES QUICKLY ,LIVING IN FLORIDA I KNOW BUGS,IT REALLY KILLS THEM,I'M HAPPY WITH THIS .I ALSO SPRAY IT ON MY SCREEN LANAI,AND IT KILLS BUGS THAT LAND ON THE SCREEN.ONE BOTTLE GOES A LONG WAY.
customer_reviews.author: SAGGIO

customer_reviews.title: This is powerful stuff and you must really pay attention ...
customer_reviews.text: This is powerful stuff and you must really pay attention to the mixing directions. It appears to be working but this is not the only product we are using. Steaming, contact spray, residual spray, powdering, heating items that can be heated and using NuVan pro strips on electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Amber in GA

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my 500 unit apartment complexes!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works better than the stuff used by any pest control service I have ever used. I manage two complexes (over 500 units) and this stuff work for everything...ants, roaches, water bugs, bedbugs etc. You will not be able to find anything that works better. I have since started using it in my home every six months and we do not see any bugs!!
customer_reviews.author: Spangie07

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: Earwigs, spiders, and palmetto bugs....ugh! I've sprayed the perimeter of my house plus doorways and it stopped pests dead in their tracks. I will spray once a month to maintain protection. Way cheaper than using a pest control company and I get the same results. I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KWnc2987

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Syngenta's Demand CS Insecticide works! It is an awesome product! No kidding, the first time we tried it back in 2017, about 3 or 4 months later, we still saw dead bugs and dead spiders show up - on steps, on the porch, you name it! And that's without having to spray a second time! My husband said "I can't believe this stuff is still working after spraying months ago!!" Needless to say, we've been using it ever since. Before the summer sets in. Spraying one good time really does the job. And a little bit goes a long way! It is effective. It is long-lasting. We will always have a bottle on hand! Incredible product! Works wonderfully for us!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cotton

customer_reviews.title: The Best - follow the easy to follow directions and it will work.
customer_reviews.text: For years I have not been able to control carpenter bees. The traps worked but they had to decide to go in it. While applying some of the other insecticides no effect. When applying this as directed I put some in a hole. It killed two instantly. This stuff is great. Do not hesitate. Seriously
customer_reviews.author: M P

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the harvest ants
customer_reviews.text: We walked into a huge issue with harvest ants in one of our rooms (super gross) out of no where. We have never had this issue before, but in our neighborhood there is a lot of new builds happen right now so I believe that caused it. We sprayed only the outside walls of the house I’m the evening, after the hottest part of the day so the product had time to dry. After 2 days we no longer found any live ants, just dead ones.
customer_reviews.author: UnicornMom

customer_reviews.title: I've only use this product. 3 time, the first was instant relief
customer_reviews.text: I've only use this product. 3 time, the first was instant relief and the other two have been follow ups. Still less than 4 months in but wow. Will update again later. This product has done the job so far. And yes i would recommend and buy and usethis product again. No one has asked me to endorse this product. This is my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My husband didn’t read the directions properly and put the entire container in with 1 gal of water. I was irritated that it wouldn’t work because it wasn’t diluted properly but a few days later and all the spiders in our garage are dead so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Kills Stink Bugs!
customer_reviews.text: It actually kills stink bugs - even after some rain outside and a week has passed. No "big box" store item seems able to do this - even immediately after application - even when sprayed right on the bug. I discovered after that there are generic versions of this for those who want to save some money. One bottle will last a long time - just a few mL fills an entire gallon sprayer. You will get many, many gallons out of this
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Poison leaking out everywhere, but no bugs on package.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product have used it for several years however like another reviewer, I received this leaking all over in the package. Bottle is about a third empty... A superior product... What's left of it. Why this is even shipped in a bag I don't know. I've already washed everything off and my hands or I would post a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Strode

customer_reviews.title: No longer use an exterminator
customer_reviews.text: I used to pay $90/quarter for an exterminator because spiders/ants are horrible in the south. I no longer use them, I spray myself. It doesn't fade paint and is safe for carpets and wood floors. I have small dogs and it has never been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: ❤ Cindy ❤

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use only this product if you need to eliminate any insects, guarantee
customer_reviews.author: Renata Jubran

customer_reviews.title: Carpenter Bees Gone
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for a carpenter bee problem. They are big robust critters and the first dilution I tried was 12ml per gallon water which didn't seem to do the trick. I then tried 36ml per gallon, and the bees disappeared within a few days. I sprayed it directly in the holes they carve into the wood and the adjacent surface.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clemmons

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Works great on stink bugs and box elder bugs. Sprayed once outside and they were gone the next day. I sprayed for spiders around the base of the walls in the basement and it’s been good for a few months. This bottle will last a lifetime. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: armywife

customer_reviews.title: Works good for most things - need a little extra for wasps it seems.
customer_reviews.text: One application was enough to kill and prevent most bugs, but it took more application and a stronger dose to kill the yellow jackets underneath my soffits.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product next morning dead bugs everywhere and haven’t seen one sense. Mixing solution directions took a min to figure out. But amazing product and works so well. I have no more earwigs at all
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M Zenteno

customer_reviews.title: Don't wast your money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was a joke I mixed it as directed with no results then a week latter I mixed it again with no results then I tried it at double strength and I still have wasp every where ..it does nothing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even begin to explain how incredible this bug spray works. Please do not pay someone tons of money to come spray your house. Buy this and do it yourself. Save some moola! It has literally killed every kind of bug that tried to crawl/slither into my house. The bugs that were already inside were found dead by the next day and everything else has stayed out.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: You will never see another bug
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and its been 5 years and I still have not seen a roach, a family member told be about this Insecticide , and I tell everyone if they want to get rid of bugs buy this item. It works indoor and out-doors.
customer_reviews.author: BETTY JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely the best I've ever used. I spray it in spring around my baseboards inside and the garage, and outside around the base of my home, and find no more than one or two bugs inside all year. Outside, it kills all pests that crawl out from underneath my home. I spray some on the wall around my porch light and it keeps moths away from that area. I live about 100 feet from a creek and wild area so had serious problems with all kinds of spiders, including black widows, before I started using this product two years ago. There is practically no odor and once it dries, it is safe for my pets and grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: sara1133

customer_reviews.title: Bee Killer
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor had a bee problem so I let him use this at twice the suggested concentration. Long story short the bees where all dead within 30 min however it did aggravate them at first.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of different types of insects around and in my house after using product after a week I have not seen many insects inside the house mainly ants
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Finally something that keeps the roaches and millipedes at bay. Long lasting, odorless, and cost-effective. Hopefully it's safe.
customer_reviews.author: David Fussell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money it sux...
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste ur time this stuff is crap does not work at all..went by everyone's reviews and wtf people I guess I have super bugs cause this stuff doesn't even begin to phase them
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for two years, and it even kills those annoying little gnats that cluster in swarms at dusk, ants, silverfish, etc. It has pretty much taken care of all the insect annoyances, sometimes with just one application.

customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It will kill Fire Ants immediately. Also bugs and spiders. This product is worth the money.

customer_reviews.text: Used this product when I was a professional exterminator. Love this material Workwell on keeping passed away

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: The bugs & scorpions we did find were dead so I think it's doing its job. This time last year we found 5 this year 1 or 2 scorpions.

customer_reviews.title: I used it before good product.  For just a little better than demon last longer.  lot expensive
customer_reviews.text: I used it before good product. For just a little better than demon last longer. And a lot more expensive

customer_reviews.title: Saves tons of money on this instead of $300 PLUS for exterminators for small jobs like ants and other pests
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to insecticide. Virtually no smell, no stains, works fast. Saves tons of money on this instead of $300 PLUS for exterminators for small jobs like ants and other pests....

customer_reviews.title: Great product THAT REALLY WORK AGAINST BED BUGS
customer_reviews.text: I thought at first it wasn't gonna be enough because it looked small when I opened it up but I was surprised it really got looted and stretched out and did my whole home a few times great product I will always keep it I almost called the professionals but in two weeks I seen nothing absolutely nothing so happy🤗
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Conner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pesticide that kills off the carpenter bees without bringing in an expensive exterminator.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahjtt

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I used demon WP and this mixed all together to make yellow jacks and wasp worst nightmare. Killed them dead. Still no sign of them 2 months later. Plus no signs of any other bugs as well.
customer_reviews.author: christopher johnson

customer_reviews.title: Insect Treatment
customer_reviews.text: I use this to treat exterior of house myself, rather than pay for a service. Seems to do as well, and monthly treatment less expensive than quarterly treatment by a company.
customer_reviews.author: SL60

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! A friend of my wife suggested it because it worked great for her. I read the reviews as well. We had issues with cockroaches in our garage and ants on the patio. After applying Demand CS, all is quite. The cockroaches that were in the garage are DEAD! The ants are history as well. This stuff works! I definitely recommend buying. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Owens

customer_reviews.title: Kills errrrythang...and then some!
customer_reviews.text: Kills errrrrythang....except people...well, maybe slowly....but I have no data to support that! JK All jokes aside this stuff has great residual and really does kill everything :)
customer_reviews.author: Dagirlgenius

customer_reviews.title: Great product to eliminate pests that you don't think will go away.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on capenter bees. Had not found another product that would kill and keep killing them after the application of this product. Will recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Charles E

customer_reviews.title: Pordct came delevered in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.text: I use Demand CS in my sprayer to kill scorpions around my home exterior and garage. It only takes me about 15 minutes to spray around the entrance ways and under windows as well as most of the garage floor. One 8oz container lasts me many months (about 16) so for ~$35 it is a better deal then a $30 per month for a local exterminator to spray the same areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for inside too!
customer_reviews.text: Demand CS is some of the best stuff I have ever used around my home and on the inside as well. My only wish is that the pour spout was a little better designed. It can be challenging to make sure you pour in the measured amount accurately because more liquid can run into the reservoir while pouring.

customer_reviews.title: Strong product  Do not use around pets
customer_reviews.text: Use Around the house for bed bugs and roaches did the job effectively but course my dog to cough And choke a lot after 8 hours of being away from the house. Recommended do not use around pets pets will Be affected
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS J.  JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Same as the bug Guy uses
customer_reviews.text: Better than having the bug Guy stop out using the same chemical

customer_reviews.title: No More Mosquitoes!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I sprayed my yard and had no mosquitoes for about 6 weeks. Next year I'll spray once a month, the cost is very low per use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This really works my home is bug free for the first time in my life. I even sit outside in peace
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: This spray seems to work the best. The bees come back at least twice a ...
customer_reviews.text: Live in North Florida (Pensacola). Our home is cypress sided. The Carpenter Bees have tried to make it into swiss cheese. This spray seems to work the best. The bees come back at least twice a year. We try to limit the damage with this spray.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Rich

customer_reviews.title: A stinkbug's nemesis
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of a plague-sized stink bug infestation. For weeks I was crawling out of my skin. I contacted my apartment complex who told me that the brown marmoset is a protected pest and that they could do nothing about it. I ordered this stuff and those things started dying left and right. I sprinkled it around the perimeter of my apartment. It has done a great job keeping most of them out . I need to sprinkle more, but I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Femme Fatale

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. When you follow the directions, you can get rid of Bed Bugs quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H. 1994

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to be super effective on carpenter bees. Tried a few concentrations. Those things are tough.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Boyd

product_meta.title: Syngenta 73654 Demand CS Insecticide, 8oz
product_meta.description: Lambda-cyhalothrin integrated with micro-encapsulated technology which gives it an unparalleled residual & protection against a long list of insects. Demand cs can be used both indoors & outdoors & has no odor & will not stain surfaces. It will treat more than 30 of the most common insects such as spiders, wasps, flies, fleas, ticks, bed bugs & ants.
feature_bullets: Demand cs controls more than 30 Common insects including spiders, ants, flies, wasps, fleas, ticks and bed bugs.
Demand cs is a water-based insecticide concentrate that offers excellent indoor and outdoor pest control.
Each 8 oz bottle makes 8 - 40 gallons (mixed at 0. 2 to 0. 8 oz/6 to 24 ml per gallon of water).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars942 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
